question: Which is the longest dam built in Madhya Pradesh?
explanation:
Indira Sagar Dam-653 m
Bansagar Dam-1,020 m
Bargi Dam- 5357 m Gandhi
sagar Dam- 514 metres
Indira sagar dam is the highest dam of Madhya Pradesh-with height of 92 metres.
Hirakud Dam of India built on Mahanadi River, situated in Sambalpur district,Odisha state is the longest dam with Total Length = 25.79 Kilometers
